movie.title: Blind
movie.description_intro: Having recently lost her sight, Ingrid retreats to the safety of her home - a place where she can feel in control, alone with her husband and her thoughts. But Ingrid's real problems lie within, not beyond the walls of her apartment, and her deepest fears and repressed fantasies soon take over.
movie.description_full: Having recently lost her sight, Ingrid retreats to the safety of her home - a place where she can feel in control, alone with her husband and her thoughts. But Ingrid's real problems lie within, not beyond the walls of her apartment, and her deepest fears and repressed fantasies soon take over.

movies.title: The Sheltering Sky
movies.summary: The American artist couple Port and Kit Moresby travels aimless through Africa, searching for new experiences that could give new sense to their relationship. But the flight to distant regions leads both only deeper into despair.
movies.description_full: The American artist couple Port and Kit Moresby travels aimless through Africa, searching for new experiences that could give new sense to their relationship. But the flight to distant regions leads both only deeper into despair.
movies.synopsis: The American artist couple Port and Kit Moresby travels aimless through Africa, searching for new experiences that could give new sense to their relationship. But the flight to distant regions leads both only deeper into despair.

movies.title: Lake of Death
movies.summary: Lillan and some friends travel back to the remote cabin by the little lake, where her twin brother died last year, and soon after arriving strange things starts happening. Inspired by the 1958 classic horror film.
movies.description_full: Lillan and some friends travel back to the remote cabin by the little lake, where her twin brother died last year, and soon after arriving strange things starts happening. Inspired by the 1958 classic horror film.
movies.synopsis: Lillan and some friends travel back to the remote cabin by the little lake, where her twin brother died last year, and soon after arriving strange things starts happening. Inspired by the 1958 classic horror film.

movies.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
movies.title_english: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
movies.title_long: The Perks of Being a Wallflower (2012)

movies.title: Almost Love
movies.summary: Does every relationship have an expiration date? Adam and Marklin are about to find out. Their 5- year relationship has gone from a passionate flame to a medium burn, forcing them to reconcile with each other's shortcomings all while watching their support network crumble around them. Best friend Cammy's latest beau checks all of her boxes - if you don't count that he actually lives in a box; Haley's student is more interested in studying her than for the SATs; and Elizabeth and Damon - the "stable" ones - are on the brink of divorce after 15 years of so-called bliss. But, in this mess, hope springs eternal as they all hilariously muddle their way through to try and make life work.

Their 5- year relationship has gone from a passionate flame to a medium burn, forcing them to reconcile with each other's shortcomings all while watching their support network crumble around them. Best friend Cammy's latest beau checks all of her boxes - if you don't count that he actually lives in a box; Haley's student is more interested in studying her than for the SATs; and Elizabeth and Damon - the "stable" ones - are on the brink of divorce after 15 years of so-called bliss. But, in this mess, hope springs eternal as they all hilariously muddle their way through to try and make life work.
